Plecto | DevOps | Full time | ONSITE | Aarhus, Denmark

Plecto (https://www.plecto.com/) is a small danish SaaS startup that builds team-motivation software. We love new technologies and are passionate about building solid architectures that scale. We are looking for a full time DevOps to join our existing team of 3 developers. Do you like optimizing code for performance and scaling cloud-based infrastructure? Then we'd love to talk with you!

You should have an interest in these technologies:

- AWS - Python - Django - PostgreSQL - DynamoDB - ElasticSearch - Distributed Programming - Websockets

We offer:

- A competitive salary - A great, relaxed work environment - Very good catered lunch - Any hardware you need

Interested? You can e-mail me at ales@plecto.com!
